Uses of Class
game.Tile

Packages that use Tile
Package
Description
game
 
pieces
This package holds all the different types of pieces that are used in a game of chess, specifically: King, Queen, Bishop, Knight, Pawn, and Rook.

  • Uses of Tile in game

    Fields in game declared as Tile
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Tile[][]
    Chessboard.board
    A 2D array containing Tile objects which represent a 7X7 chessboard.

    Returns tile at row y, column x.

    Queen.hasNoCollisions(int x, int y, Tile[][] tiles)
